author: Mark Scheierman
comment: Was very excited to find the updated version. I had the old version but it never aligned correctly on my Huawei watch. This version looks great. The only request I have is could you make it so you can't change the color scheme when tapping the watch, but can still use the other interactive functions? With it on I always change my watch face color which is annoying. Unfortunately if I turn it off I can't access anything on the watch. I think the option to select the color scheme should be a totally separate on and off option from the other interactive functions. Thanks and keep up the great work.

author: Sharifuddin Omar
comment: Why the weather needs to be manually updated?

author: Emanuel Oliveira
comment: Love this and unlocked premium but when i touch Agenda in edge of bottom-right in my moto360 i see no events, when i have events in google calendar. can you please advise how to fix this problem?

reply.author: Smart Art Studios
reply.content: Hello sir, if you did not seen any event, then select any other watch face and select marine digital watch face again, you will get the events on watch face. Only today's events.

author: David Richards
comment: liked it before, now iis even better ☺️

reply.author: Smart Art Studios
reply.content: Thanks David for your support.  Glad to hear that you like it.

author: James P
comment: Like the watch face itself, lots of data and easy to read, weather interactive works really well.  However the options around the face (Stopwatch, Timer, Agenda, Menu) seem to be hit and miss, trying to get them to work can sometimes take a dozen or more touches.  I'm using the Moto 360G2 so I'm not sure if it is the watch but very frustrating, especially the Menu Option.  Also although the app provides the ability to change the colours of the ambient mode it does not appear to work, not matter what I set the ambient mode stays as white text on black background.  There is no date in ambient mode which really should be a standard feature.  Lastly the constant ads still popping up after paying for premium are extremely annoying.  I appreciate that paying for premium unlocks the features but it should remove the adds as well especially since you sometimes have to go through 2 or 3 of them to get into the app.  Thankfully once the face is setup I won't have to access the app very often so I can deal with it.

reply.author: Smart Art Studios
reply.content: We have fixed your problem and made some changes in watch face layout. please update to latest version it. Thanks

author: Paul Avery
comment: Very useful interactive areas on a good clear display. Well worth the premium price. Sony Smartwatch 3.

reply.author: Smart Art Studios
reply.content: Thanks for your support.  Glad to hear that you like it.

reply.author: Smart Art Studios
reply.content: Please contact us through email. Smartartstudio6.android@gmail.com and tell us your confusion.

author: Hafizi Shuhaimi
comment: already bought premium not too long ago..now i need to purchase back for wear 2.0???

reply.author: Smart Art Studios
reply.content: Hello sir you can ask for refund. Or contact us for any questions, we will solve your problem.  Smartartstudio6.android@gmail.com contact us. .

author: Henry Handoko
comment: Already bought the premium version but still showing ads when close the app. VERY ANNOYING.  No option to change displayed element. I want to change weather forecast with battery info for example.  No option to change how it looks when on dim mode. I don't need weather forecast nor step counter when on dim mode.  Uninstalled.

reply.author: Smart Art Studios
reply.content: We have fixed your problem and made some changes in watch face layout. please update to latest version it. Thanks

author: Az Bens
comment: I have a huawei watch connected to iPhone 8 iOS 11.0.2 The watch face is beautiful unfortunately no button works  Can’t do anything

Works fine, easy to use, looks good.  -I wish the weather update could be more frequent.  -Agenda doesnt refresh unless you change and switch back to the watchface.  -App launcher could have featured custom apps from the watch.  Otherwise great watch face :)

author: eddington maxwell
comment: Just put a price tag on the thing! Unless you pay, you only get the watch face with only a step counter as a widget. Dont download!

comment: Got premium and now surprise buy agein... No thank you
